definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The navigation rules and tonnage regulation of Panama Canal.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿馬運河的航行和噸位規定。

sentences.english: The Panama Canal opened almost one hundred years ago.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿馬運河開通於近100年前。

sentences.english: Alajuela is one of two artificial lakes linked to the Panama Canal (not  pictured).
sentences.chinese: 阿拉胡埃拉湖是連接着巴拿馬運河的兩個人工河之一。

sentences.english: An increasing number of ships are built to the Panamax limit to carry the maximum amount of cargo through the canal.
sentences.chinese: 此類船隻的日益增加正成爲巴拿馬運河的一大難題。

sentences.english: Navigation lights glow in the background on the Panama Canal.
sentences.chinese: 它背後是巴拿馬運河上的導航燈。

sentences.english: The Panama Canal joins two oceans.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿馬運河連通兩大洋。

sentences.english: Part of a six-reel film on the construction of the Panama Canal.
sentences.chinese: 從空中拍攝的記錄巴拿馬運河的施工的影片。

sentences.english: He travelled from New York to California via the Panama Cannel .
sentences.chinese: 他經由巴拿馬運河從紐約到加利福尼亞。

sentences.english: Houston is the closest U.S. port to the Panama Canal.
sentences.chinese: 休斯敦是美國港口中最靠近巴拿馬運河的一個。

sentences.english: Through the Panama Canal it is linked with Atlantic ports of Americas and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 通過巴拿馬運河，它與美國和歐洲的大西洋港口相連。
